references.paper_title: AMP: Adversarial motion priors for stylized physics-based character control
references.reason: This paper introduces the Adversarial Motion Priors (AMP) framework, which is the foundation for the physics-based character control used in CooHOI.
This paper addresses the problem of synthesizing natural and physically plausible human-object interactions, which is a core element of the CooHOI framework.

references.paper_title: DeepMimic: Example-guided deep reinforcement learning of physics-based character skills
references.reason: This work provides a foundational method for learning physics-based character skills via deep reinforcement learning, which CooHOI builds upon for single-agent skill learning.

references.paper_title: The surprising effectiveness of PPO in cooperative multi-agent games
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the effectiveness of Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) in cooperative multi-agent settings, which CooHOI uses for its multi-agent training phase.

references.paper_title: Revisiting parameter sharing in multi-agent deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper explores different parameter sharing strategies in multi-agent reinforcement learning, which is relevant to CooHOI's approach for efficient multi-agent training.
